scenario_text.value: Whoa, what’s with this fog?

Yeah, man... There wasn’t nothin’ like this
when we came through earlier.

If we go out in this now we’ll be just as
lost as the others.
What about Saki? And that scream just now...
Aaaaaaah! Stay away from meee!
Wait... What the heck was that?!
Is...is she being attacked by something?
You mean like a pervert?
A pervert? On a MOUNTAIN?!

Maybe it’s a boar or something? Yeah, I can
hear...growling, I think?

Whoa, hey! I... Was it just me, or did
something light up over there?
We should head towards her voice!

Are your eyes playing tricks on you?
I can barely see a thing around here.
This fog is seriously weird, man...

It bothers me too, but not as much as Saki’s
screams!
Yeah!
Hey, Sakiii! Ryooo! Are you okay?!
Wait! Something’s here!
What is that... Some kind of statue?
No...no, that thing’s moving!
What in the world...? That’s impossible...

That sound again! So this weird thing was
making it?
YEEEEEEK!
Yeeep! Back off, you freak show!
What is that?!

Hey, what’s going on?! I heard a bunch of
screaming back there!
Miu! You were here the whole time!
What? Kaito?! Why are you here?!
Wait, Saki! We’re coming to help!
Is that you, Aoi?! No, stay away!
No, come here and heeelp!
That creepy thing’s looking this way...
Wh-wha-what should we dooo?!

It’s not like we can just leave them alone,
right? Even if she tells us to?

(This weird statue-like creature’s set its
sights on the others...)
(A creature...? No...a monster?!)

What’re you waiting for?! Get the hell over
here, already!

Could that be one of the Kemonogami?!
No...how could that be?!
(Professor! He followed us from the shrine?)

(We have to save those guys from this
monster...!)
(What should we do?)
Get closer and talk.
Run while you can!
Get close.
Let’s try talking to it...

Yeah, it could just be some kid pulling
a prank. Hey, you there!
Whoa, hold on, Shuuji!

How heavy would a kid have to be to leave
footprints that deep?!
Footprints...?
Wha—UWAAAH!
Look out, Shuuji!
Ungh!
Takuma?!

Ugh... What the heck... It barely grazed me,
and yet...what power...

Are, are you all right?! I’m so sorry...
You saved me there...
This is bad! Let’s get out of here!
Run away.
Saki, Ryo! Are you okay?!
Is, is that you, Takuma?!
Run now, while you can!
Oh jeez, oh boy...
We’ll go over there, so you go hide, Miu!
All right...
I...I say we run!

You don’t gotta tell me twice.
Let’s make like a tree and leave!

Really! You REALLY have to make jokes at
a time like this?!
Quiet, guys, let’s get out of here!

...Are you seriously taking out your phone,
Minoru?!

My camera’s got that night sight, baby! I bet
it’ll cut through the fog, yeah?

We might never see a thing like this again!
So I gotta snap while the snapping’s good!

(Minoru hasn’t noticed how close the monster
has gotten! We can’t save him in time!)
Get out of the way, Minoru!
...Say what?
Uwaaah!!!
Minoru!!!

...Freaking OW. This thing isn’t pulling its
punches...

Thanks, Takuma. I would’ve taken that head-
on if you hadn’t said something.

Can you move, Minoru? You must get out of
there!

(A creature we’ve never seen before is coming
right at us! What’s going on?!)

(What a crazy situation we’ve gotten into.
Why the heck is this happening?!)
Yeep!
You okay, Aoi?!

(Oh no, Aoi fell down! And that rock monster
is coming this way!)
Stop! Stay away from her!!!
(I can’t let it hurt Aoi!)
Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!
(That thing just sent me flying!)
Ahhh, jeez, ow... Man, that thing’s strong...

I’m lucky I got away with a few scratches
after a tackle like that...
The others...! Hey! You guys okay?!
Takuma! Are you all right?
I’m sorry... This is all my fault!
(Everyone seems to be okay, somehow...)

(The fog has covered the entire area. There’s
red spider lilies at my feet. So creepy...)
...Guys! You there?!
Ahhh... AAAAAAH!
Huh?
There’s more of them all around us?!

This is bad...
It’s getting closer and closer!

(We’re in for a world of hurt. Is there any
way we can make a break for it?)
Wha’...huh?
I’m feeling...kinda dizzy...

(Am I going numb? Or did I take a harder hit
than I thought?)
(Or is it...?)
Huh? An earthquake, at a time like this?!
Crap... And the fog is getting thicker, too!
Is everyone okay?!

Be careful, everyone! Move without paying
attention and you’ll—WAHHH!
What is it, Shuuji?!
Whoa!

(I tried taking a step forward, and the
ground crumbled underneath me!)

(I plunged into a gaping hole that seemed to
pull me in...)

(I couldn’t even tell what was happening to
everyone else..)

(Unchecked development...recent landslides...
The professor’s words are coming back to me.)
UWAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!
